column9: Good air pump, does not leak air while pumping
column10:
Good air pump. Following is what I think about it -

- Its does not leak air while pumping which is great, since many pumps have this problem otherwise (I mean the whole where air is sucked from).
- Its quite small but effective, so u can carry it if u have deep pockets or a small handbag.
- One think which I did not like is that only 1 needle fits perfectly, other leaks air as its loose.

Very good quality pump.. Small pump, portable and very effective.. Ease of use.. Original product, well packed.. Just a grain of doubt about it being first hand cos the box was a bit torn at the top.. Must buy..
